author: radekkapka
content:
Does Nimbus' implementation of https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/?urls.primaryName=dev#/Validator/produceBlockV3 not support pre-Electra blocks? I see this error:
> Failed to request block from beacon node: invalid ssz encoding. first variable element offset indexes into fixed value data

author: radekkapka
content: This is running with Prysm VC which uses v3 exclusively

author: radekkapka
content: All other clients (Prysm, Teku, Lodestar, Lighthouse) produce blocks without issues

author: radekkapka
content: This error disappears after the Electra fork

author: tersec
content: we'd probably not have tested it much, but does it work with JSON?
